rename.from: Reusing LottieAnimationView with different animations doesn
rename.to: Reusing LottieAnimationView with different animations cause problems

body: It's happening the same using 3.6.0. Just start using Lottie and it was strange that the same was not happening to anyone else. Apparently is a bug.
Seeing the same in Hinge - we have this exact case in our main screen animated loader. Has worked fine for 2 years until upgrading to 3.6.0.
Thanks for the report. I'll look into this. I'll also accept a PR.
@victor5171 @romaopedro @kaeawc Oddly, I'm not seeing this same behavior. Could one of you make a repro in the issue-repro module? If you can, I can take a look asap.
Hello, I have the same issue in my app - works fine on 3.5 but broken on 3.6
@natansalda Can you post a repro so I can take a look?

issue.title: Ignore unscheduleDrawable when updating a composition

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

body: Lottie 3.6.1 has been released with a fix for this.

with 3.6.1 is still not working for me 
same issue
As a workaround, at least when using setMinAndMaxFrame, you can cancel animation before using it and restart playing after. It seems working for my app's users (I can't reproduce the bug on my own)
Facing the same issue, is the LottieAnimationView not reusable? Once an animation ends, no other animation can be rendered on it again.
Removing `app:lottie_autoPlay="true"` from XML and calling `playAnimation()` manually fixed it for me.
